name: Planet Escape LD46
description:
Intro

Slowly running out of oxygen, his only chance of survival is using his trusted robot and fabricator to channel enough energy from repaired generators into the antenna to signal the ship.

Instructions

The overall goal is to fill the antenna with energy.

* Click & hold mouse to steer robot
* Select generator to get into close-up
* Place connectors & splitters to power correct and finally all outputs
* Build new connectors & splitters in the fabricator next to the antenna

YouTubers and Streamer

Please leave a link to your video or stream/clip in the comments :)

LD46 Jam Page

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/planet-escape
